Hobby Implementation

From Peragro Tempus Wiki

Progression 


import time
import random
 
class Skill:
	def __init__(self, name, xp):
		self.name = name
		self.xp = xp
 
	def GetXP(self):
		return self.xp
 
	def AddXP(self, i):
		self.xp += i
 
	def __repr__(self):
		return "('%s' %d)" % (self.name, self.xp)
 
class Player:
	def __init__(self):
		self.skills = [Skill("Strength", 0), Skill("Hobby 1", 0), Skill("Hobby 2", 0), Skill("Hobby 3", 0)]
 
	def GetSkill(self, i):
		return self.skills[i]
 
	def GetSkills(self):
		return self.skills
 
	def GetSkillCount(self):
		return len(self.skills)
 
	def __repr__(self):
		return "%s" % (self.skills)
 
def GetTotalXP(player):
	xp = 0
	for i in range(player.GetSkillCount()):
		xp += player.GetSkill(i).GetXP()
	return xp
 
def Distribute(distribute, hobbies):
	for i in range(len(hobbies)):
		for j in range(i+1):
			#print i,j,distribute
			if distribute > 0:
				hobbies[j].AddXP(1)
				distribute -= 1
 
	if distribute > 0:
		Distribute(distribute, hobbies)	
 
def Update():
	player = Player()
 
	size = 5 # 5 per second, 4 per minute
	counter = time.localtime(time.time())[size]
	currentXP = GetTotalXP(player)
 
	while True:
		if (counter - time.localtime(time.time())[size]) == 0:
			continue
		else:
			hobbyXP = 20
			#hobbyXP = random.randint(1,20)
 
			# A Test
			player.GetSkill(0).AddXP(random.randint(0,25))
 
			if (currentXP + hobbyXP) > GetTotalXP(player):
				hobbyXP = (currentXP + hobbyXP) - GetTotalXP(player)
				Distribute(hobbyXP, player.GetSkills()[1:])
			else:
				hobbyXP = 0
 
 
			print "An hour passed! Distribute", hobbyXP, "experience. (Gained: ", GetTotalXP(player) - currentXP,")"
			print player, "\n"
			counter = time.localtime(time.time())[size]
			currentXP = GetTotalXP(player)
 
 
 
Update()
